bibl.title: Ordinary Objects in Christian Healing Sanctuaries. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The population of a healing shrine. - Transportation and lodgings. - Catering to the practical needs of the pilgrims. - Healing: incubation. - Inspecting and cleaning the church. - Catering to the spiritual needs of the faithful: blessed bread and the eucharist. - Conclusion: attention to objects.

bibl.title: Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity.

bibl.seg: CASEAU Béatrice, Ordinary Objects in Christian Healing Sanctuaries. Avec résumé en anglais.
Luke LAVAN, Ellen SWIFT and Toon PUTZEYS (Edd.), Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity = Late Antique Archaeology. 5 (Leiden - Boston, 2007) pp. 625-654, 1 fig.

Introduction. - The population of a healing shrine. - Transportation and lodgings. - Catering to the practical needs of the pilgrims. - Healing: incubation. - Inspecting and cleaning the church. - Catering to the spiritual needs of the faithful: blessed bread and the eucharist. - Conclusion: attention to objects.
